library(tidyverse)
library

ncdc_temp <- read_csv('https://bcdanl.github.io/data/ncdc_temp_cleaned.csv')

#1:

ggplot(data = ncdc_temp) + 
  geom_smooth(mapping = 
               aes(x = month, 
                   y = temperature, 
                   group = location,
                   color = location) ) 

#2:

ggplot(data = ncdc_temp) + 
  geom_boxplot(mapping = 
               aes(x = month, 
                   y = temperature), fill = "grey" )

#3:

ggplot(data = ncdc_temp) + 
  geom_density_ridges(mapping = 
               aes(x = temperature, 
                   y = month), fill = " deepskyblue" )

#4:
datasets::mtcars

ggplot(data = mtcars) + 
  geom_point(mapping = 
               aes(x = disp, 
                   y = mpg, color = hp))

#5: 
popgrowth_df <- read_csv(
  'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/popgrowth.csv')

reorder_state_popgrowth<-reorder(popgrowth_df$state, popgrowth_df$popgrowth)

ggplot(data = popgrowth_df) + 
  geom_col(mapping = 
               aes(x = popgrowth, 
                   y = reorder_state_popgrowth, fill = region))
                   
#6:
male_Aus <- read_csv(
  'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/aus_athletics_male.csv')

ggplot(data = male_Aus) + 
  geom_point(mapping = 
               aes(x = pcBfat, 
                   y = height, shape = sport, color = sport))

#7:
titanic <- read_csv(
  'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/titanic_cleaned.csv')

ggplot(data = titanic) +
            geom_density(mapping = 
              aes( x = age,
                  fill = sex))

cows_filtered <- read_csv(
  'https://bcdanl.github.io/data/cows_filtered.csv')

ggplot(data = cows_filtered) + 
  geom_density(mapping = 
               aes(x = butterfat, 
                   fill = breed) )
